thread.section_title: Instant Tax Solutions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Instant Tax Solutions | www.instanttaxsolutions.com
thread.title: Mr. Bryant:
thread.title_full: Instant Tax Solutions reviewed by Mr. Bryant:

author: Mr. Bryant:
title: Mr. Bryant:
text: Frankly, I thought this was going to be money thrown down the drain. It took several years and a lot of perseverance but ITS came thru with an amicable resolution. The entire staff was highly professional and courteous. On a few occasions, the staff had to talk me off the ledge. Atty. Eric Joesph's effort on this case was exceptional and the firm is indeed fortunate to have him. Nothing in life is guaranteed but I feel comfortable enough to recommend their services.
